reasoning: The incorrect design shows the 'Shop now' button without a proper border on the left and top sides. Upon inspecting the CSS in the #page-styles section, the 'buttonLink' class has its 'border-left-width' and 'border-top-width' set to 0px. The correct design should have a border on all sides. To fix this, we need to change 'border-left-width' and 'border-top-width' to 1px.
